divs: Sighting DetailsI was letting my dog out at around 4:20 am on August 5 of 2011, my dog began to bark looking up and growling. I looked up and first I thought it was a star, i got my dog inside and turned around the object was now in a differant spot in the sky. I went inside and retrieved my binoculours i looked at the object and it was moving very slowly i could see it and it had a very bright orange almost whitish glow to it, I became scared it had some kind of wierd symbols on the underside, It acted like it knew i was there and looked like it was getting closer, I ran inside at that same time i heard a helicopter coming i looked again off my porch the helicopter was close the object, the object dissapeared and the helicopter stayed in the area for around 10 minutes and left this happens almost every night some times there is more than one object there is a power line tower in my neighbors back yeard that is where the object appears to hover over.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around August 5th 2011
Summary: Very bright with some kind of symbols on the underside
